caption.p:
Effect of the treatment with LEO on carrageenan-induced paw edema in mice (a). Myeloperoxidase activity (b). Nitric oxide concentration (c). Values represent mean values ± standard error of the mean for each group. A significant difference at
∗
p < 0.001 and
∗∗
p < 0.0001 compared with the carrageenan (Cg) group (one-way ANOVA, Tukey test).
